description.narrative: Climate change is resulting in unpredictable rainfall that often comes as a flood, exacerbating land degradation. Those most vulnerable are ‘child headed households’ units headed by an older child where both parents have passed away, usually as a result of the genocide or HIV and AIDS. This project will support these very vulnerable households in improved agricultural techniques, providing small livestock and in household and farm management. As a result, child headed households will be better able to withstand climate change, and government programmes will change so that agricultural advice, environmental policy, and the allocation of resources will be informed by effective climate change adaptation approaches and the particular needs of vulnerable children
